name: Dialog
description: The Dialog component is a Modal variation that appears at the center of the screen.

props.name: variant
props.doc: The dialog variant. Can either be `information` or `confirmation`. Defaults to `information`.

props.name: title
props.doc: The dialog title. Displays on the very top of the content.

props.name: minWidth
props.doc: The minimum Dialog content width, defined by a CSS width value like `50vw` (50% of the viewport). Be careful on using fixed `minWidth` so you don't break responsiveness. Defaults to `30rem` (average width is set to `60vw`).

props.name: maxWidth
props.doc: The maximum Dialog content width, defined by a CSS width value like `20rem`. Defaults to `60rem` (average width is set to `60vw`).

props.name: className
props.doc: Give the Dialog content a class name (maps to `dnb-dialog`).

props.name: spacing
props.doc: If set to `false` then the dialog content will be shown without any spacing. Defaults to `true`.

props.name: preventCoreStyle
props.doc: By default the dialog content gets added the core style class `dnb-core-style`. Use `false` to disable this behavior.

props.name: navContent
props.doc: The content which will appear in the navigation, above the header, and side-by-side the close button.

props.name: headerContent
props.doc: The content which will appear in the header of the dialog.

props.name: modalContent
props.doc: The content which will appear when triggering the dialog.

props.name: description
props.doc: A description will be positioned below the title, but before the content. Used for Dialog variant `confirmation` to further describe what the actions will do.

props.name: verticalAlignment
props.doc: Define the vertical alignment of the container. Can be set to `top` or `center`. Defaults to `center`.

props.name: alignContent
props.doc: Define the inner horizontal alignment of the content. Can be set to `left`, `center`, `right` and `centered`. If `centered`, then the content will also be centered vertically. Defaults to `left`.

props.name: fullscreen
props.doc: If set to `true` then the dialog content will be shown as fullscreen, without showing the original content behind. Can be set to `false` to omit the auto fullscreen. Defaults to `auto`.

props.name: icon
props.doc: An icon to display at the top of the component. Should be of size medium, so make sure you import the `_medium` version of the Eufemia icon.

props.name: confirmType
props.doc: For variant confirmation, the dialog is either an informational (`info`) or a warning (`warning`) message. Defaults to `info`.

props.name: declineText
props.doc: For dialog actions, give a custom text for the decline button.

props.name: confirmText
props.doc: For dialog actions, give a custom text for the confirmation button.

props.name: hideDecline
props.doc: For variant confirmation, hide the default decline button and only show the confirmation button.

props.name: hideConfirm
props.doc: For variant confirmation, hide the default confirm button and only show the decline button.

props.name: scrollRef
props.doc: To get the scroll Element, pass in your own React ref.

props.name: contentRef
props.doc: To get the inner content Element, pass in your own React ref.

events.name: onConfirm
events.doc: For variant confirmation, handle the confirm action click. Provided with the mouse event and the Modal function `close` as arguments.

events.name: onDecline
events.doc: For variant confirmation, handle the decline action click. Provided with the mouse event and the Modal function `close` as arguments.
